greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, a(2) = 1, and for n > 2, a(n) = [A122111(n) == 1 (mod 4)] + a(A253553(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: \\ Uses also code given in A336124:
A253553(n) = if(n<=2,1,my(f=factor(n), k=#f~); if(f[k,2]>1,f[k,2]--,f[k,1] = precprime(f[k,1]-1)); factorback(f));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 17 2020
